content: the linked pattern above is to the welcome letter which contains the initial information on how the knitalong runs the full advent knitalong document with pattern and reflections can be downloaded from the vic website here version with large print and pattern only also available https //www vic-methodist-bristol org uk/advent-knitalong-2025/ victoria methodist church bristol are excited to be hosting another advent mystery knitalong this year over the course of advent participants are invited to knit a little neck scarf which can be worn or given as a present on christmas day the knitalong will follow the format of previous advent knitalongs the pattern will be laid out across 24 days 1st - 24th december and will be accompanied by reflections kindly written for us this year by vicky davies the scarf can be knitted in a variety of yarn weights and will require the following yardage/needle sizes knitters can use 4ply/fingering or sport weight yarn and will need approximately 40 - 45 grams of yarn and 3 75 mm needles alternatively knitters can use dk weight yarn in which case approximately 50 - 55 grams of yarn and 4 mm needles are needed there is the option to lengthen the scarf if you wish details given in the pattern but this will require more yarn as the pattern is made up from lace stitches a solid-coloured yarn is recommended more details of how the knitalong will run are in the welcome letter downloadable directly from here on ravelry the actual pattern and reflections will be released on wednesday 26th november as always this is a big team effort enormous thanks go to vicky for writing the reflections to helen for doing all the formatting/techy bits and to our lovely team of test knitters amanda anne grace heather judith katrin mary and mel xxx can t wait until the 1st december to start knitting i m running a promotion on my paid christmas patterns 30% off the christmas wonderland shawl festive lights dishcloth and christmas eve knitted square see each pattern for details lyn xx
